name: Gold Fish Simulator
description:
Gold Fish Simulator is a co-op game where you have to keep your gold fish alive by performing some objectives. Remeber a goldfish has a short memorie span, so manage to performe the task before he forgets. Also your get more points for eating and pooping. The obvious goal is to just swim around!

You must use Xbox controllers to play this game!

  • Use triggers to move the tail fin
  • Use shoulder buttons to move front fins in the direction of the analog sticks
  • Use A bottom to eat food and poop.

When you have that, just swim dammit!

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/2840929/fish%2...
